Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. Specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. Specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:.  The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_.-]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: The type of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel to create. Currently, SINGLE_MASTER is the only supported channel type.
Type.markdownDescription:
The type of the Kinesis Video Signaling Channel to create. Currently, SINGLE_MASTER is the only supported channel type.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

MessageTtlSeconds.description: The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.
MessageTtlSeconds.markdownDescription:
The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

Type: array
